00029 #if DBVT_BP_PROFILE
00030 struct  ProfileScope
00031 {
00032         __forceinline ProfileScope(btClock& clock,unsigned long& value) :
00033         m_clock(&clock),m_value(&value),m_base(clock.getTimeMicroseconds())
00034         {
00035         }
00036         __forceinline ~ProfileScope()
00037         {
00038                 (*m_value)+=m_clock->getTimeMicroseconds()-m_base;
00039         }
00040         btClock*                m_clock;
00041         unsigned long*  m_value;
00042         unsigned long   m_base;
00043 };
00044 #define SPC(_value_)    ProfileScope    spc_scope(m_clock,_value_)
00045 #else
00046 #define SPC(_value_)
00047 #endif

00049 //
00050 // Helpers
00051 //
00052 
00053 //
00054 template <typename T>
00055 static inline void      listappend(T* item,T*& list)
00056 {
00057         item->links[0]=0;
00058         item->links[1]=list;
00059         if(list) list->links[0]=item;
00060         list=item;
00061 }
00062 
00063 //
00064 template <typename T>
00065 static inline void      listremove(T* item,T*& list)
00066 {
00067         if(item->links[0]) item->links[0]->links[1]=item->links[1]; else list=item->links[1];
00068         if(item->links[1]) item->links[1]->links[0]=item->links[0];
00069 }
00070 
00071 //
00072 template <typename T>
00073 static inline int       listcount(T* root)
00074 {
00075         int     n=0;
00076         while(root) { ++n;root=root->links[1]; }
00077         return(n);
00078 }
00079 
00080 //
00081 template <typename T>
00082 static inline void      clear(T& value)
00083 {
00084         static const struct ZeroDummy : T {} zerodummy;
00085         value=zerodummy;
00086 }

00092 /* Tree collider        */ 
00093 struct  btDbvtTreeCollider : btDbvt::ICollide
00094 {
00095         btDbvtBroadphase*       pbp;
00096         btDbvtProxy*            proxy;
00097         btDbvtTreeCollider(btDbvtBroadphase* p) : pbp(p) {}
00098         void    Process(const btDbvtNode* na,const btDbvtNode* nb)
00099         {
00100                 if(na!=nb)
00101                 {
00102                         btDbvtProxy*    pa=(btDbvtProxy*)na->data;
00103                         btDbvtProxy*    pb=(btDbvtProxy*)nb->data;
00104 #if DBVT_BP_SORTPAIRS
00105                         if(pa->m_uniqueId>pb->m_uniqueId) 
00106                                 btSwap(pa,pb);
00107 #endif
00108                         pbp->m_paircache->addOverlappingPair(pa,pb);
00109                         ++pbp->m_newpairs;
00110                 }
00111         }
00112         void    Process(const btDbvtNode* n)
00113         {
00114                 Process(n,proxy->leaf);
00115         }
00116 };

00122 //
00123 btDbvtBroadphase::btDbvtBroadphase(btOverlappingPairCache* paircache)
00124 {
00125         m_deferedcollide        =       false;
00126         m_needcleanup           =       true;
00127         m_releasepaircache      =       (paircache!=0)?false:true;
00128         m_prediction            =       0;
00129         m_stageCurrent          =       0;
00130         m_fixedleft                     =       0;
00131         m_fupdates                      =       1;
00132         m_dupdates                      =       0;
00133         m_cupdates                      =       10;
00134         m_newpairs                      =       1;
00135         m_updates_call          =       0;
00136         m_updates_done          =       0;
00137         m_updates_ratio         =       0;
00138         m_paircache                     =       paircache? paircache    : new(btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btHashedOverlappingPairCache),16)) btHashedOverlappingPairCache();
00139         m_gid                           =       0;
00140         m_pid                           =       0;
00141         m_cid                           =       0;
00142         for(int i=0;i<=STAGECOUNT;++i)
00143         {
00144                 m_stageRoots[i]=0;
00145         }
00146 #if BT_THREADSAFE
00147     m_rayTestStacks.resize(BT_MAX_THREAD_COUNT);
00148 #else
00149     m_rayTestStacks.resize(1);
00150 #endif
00151 #if DBVT_BP_PROFILE
00152         clear(m_profiling);
00153 #endif
00154 }
00155 
00156 //
00157 btDbvtBroadphase::~btDbvtBroadphase()
00158 {
00159         if(m_releasepaircache) 
00160         {
00161                 m_paircache->~btOverlappingPairCache();
00162                 btAlignedFree(m_paircache);
00163         }
00164 }

00166 //
00167 btBroadphaseProxy*                              btDbvtBroadphase::createProxy(  const btVector3& aabbMin,
00168                                                                                                                           const btVector3& aabbMax,
00169                                                                                                                           int /*shapeType*/,
00170                                                                                                                           void* userPtr,
00171                                                                                                                           int collisionFilterGroup,
00172                                                                                                                           int collisionFilterMask,
00173                                                                                                                           btDispatcher* /*dispatcher*/)
00174 {
00175         btDbvtProxy*            proxy=new(btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btDbvtProxy),16)) btDbvtProxy(  aabbMin,aabbMax,userPtr,
00176                 collisionFilterGroup,
00177                 collisionFilterMask);
00178 
00179         btDbvtAabbMm aabb = btDbvtVolume::FromMM(aabbMin,aabbMax);
00180 
00181         //bproxy->aabb                  =       btDbvtVolume::FromMM(aabbMin,aabbMax);
00182         proxy->stage            =       m_stageCurrent;
00183         proxy->m_uniqueId       =       ++m_gid;
00184         proxy->leaf                     =       m_sets[0].insert(aabb,proxy);
00185         listappend(proxy,m_stageRoots[m_stageCurrent]);
00186         if(!m_deferedcollide)
00187         {
00188                 btDbvtTreeCollider      collider(this);
00189                 collider.proxy=proxy;
00190                 m_sets[0].collideTV(m_sets[0].m_root,aabb,collider);
00191                 m_sets[1].collideTV(m_sets[1].m_root,aabb,collider);
00192         }
00193         return(proxy);
00194 }
00195 
00196 //
00197 void                                                    btDbvtBroadphase::destroyProxy( btBroadphaseProxy* absproxy,
00198                                                                                                                            btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00199 {
00200         btDbvtProxy*    proxy=(btDbvtProxy*)absproxy;
00201         if(proxy->stage==STAGECOUNT)
00202                 m_sets[1].remove(proxy->leaf);
00203         else
00204                 m_sets[0].remove(proxy->leaf);
00205         listremove(proxy,m_stageRoots[proxy->stage]);
00206         m_paircache->removeOverlappingPairsContainingProxy(proxy,dispatcher);
00207         btAlignedFree(proxy);
00208         m_needcleanup=true;
00209 }

00213         btDbvtProxy*                                            proxy=(btDbvtProxy*)absproxy;
00214         aabbMin = proxy->m_aabbMin;
00215         aabbMax = proxy->m_aabbMax;

00232 void    btDbvtBroadphase::rayTest(const btVector3& rayFrom,const btVector3& rayTo, btBroadphaseRayCallback& rayCallback,const btVector3& aabbMin,const btVector3& aabbMax)
00233 {
00234         BroadphaseRayTester callback(rayCallback);
00235     btAlignedObjectArray<const btDbvtNode*>* stack = &m_rayTestStacks[0];
00236 #if BT_THREADSAFE
00237     // for this function to be threadsafe, each thread must have a separate copy
00238     // of this stack.  This could be thread-local static to avoid dynamic allocations,
00239     // instead of just a local.
00240     int threadIndex = btGetCurrentThreadIndex();
00241     btAlignedObjectArray<const btDbvtNode*> localStack;
00242     if (threadIndex < m_rayTestStacks.size())
00243     {
00244         // use per-thread preallocated stack if possible to avoid dynamic allocations
00245         stack = &m_rayTestStacks[threadIndex];
00246     }
00247     else
00248     {
00249         stack = &localStack;
00250     }
00251 #endif
00252 
00253         m_sets[0].rayTestInternal(      m_sets[0].m_root,
00254                 rayFrom,
00255                 rayTo,
00256                 rayCallback.m_rayDirectionInverse,
00257                 rayCallback.m_signs,
00258                 rayCallback.m_lambda_max,
00259                 aabbMin,
00260                 aabbMax,
00261         *stack,
00262                 callback);
00263 
00264         m_sets[1].rayTestInternal(      m_sets[1].m_root,
00265                 rayFrom,
00266                 rayTo,
00267                 rayCallback.m_rayDirectionInverse,
00268                 rayCallback.m_signs,
00269                 rayCallback.m_lambda_max,
00270                 aabbMin,
00271                 aabbMax,
00272         *stack,
00273                 callback);
00274 
00275 }

00291 
00292 void    btDbvtBroadphase::aabbTest(const btVector3& aabbMin,const btVector3& aabbMax,btBroadphaseAabbCallback& aabbCallback)
00293 {
00294         BroadphaseAabbTester callback(aabbCallback);
00295 
00296         const ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvtVolume) bounds=btDbvtVolume::FromMM(aabbMin,aabbMax);
00297                 //process all children, that overlap with  the given AABB bounds
00298         m_sets[0].collideTV(m_sets[0].m_root,bounds,callback);
00299         m_sets[1].collideTV(m_sets[1].m_root,bounds,callback);
00300 
00301 }

00303 
00304 
00305 //
00306 void                                                    btDbvtBroadphase::setAabb(              btBroadphaseProxy* absproxy,
00307                                                                                                                   const btVector3& aabbMin,
00308                                                                                                                   const btVector3& aabbMax,
00309                                                                                                                   btDispatcher* /*dispatcher*/)
00310 {
00311         btDbvtProxy*                                            proxy=(btDbvtProxy*)absproxy;
00312         ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvtVolume)       aabb=btDbvtVolume::FromMM(aabbMin,aabbMax);
00313 #if DBVT_BP_PREVENTFALSEUPDATE
00314         if(NotEqual(aabb,proxy->leaf->volume))
00315 #endif
00316         {
00317                 bool    docollide=false;
00318                 if(proxy->stage==STAGECOUNT)
00319                 {/* fixed -> dynamic set        */ 
00320                         m_sets[1].remove(proxy->leaf);
00321                         proxy->leaf=m_sets[0].insert(aabb,proxy);
00322                         docollide=true;
00323                 }
00324                 else
00325                 {/* dynamic set                         */ 
00326                         ++m_updates_call;
00327                         if(Intersect(proxy->leaf->volume,aabb))
00328                         {/* Moving                              */ 
00329 
00330                                 const btVector3 delta=aabbMin-proxy->m_aabbMin;
00331                                 btVector3               velocity(((proxy->m_aabbMax-proxy->m_aabbMin)/2)*m_prediction);
00332                                 if(delta[0]<0) velocity[0]=-velocity[0];
00333                                 if(delta[1]<0) velocity[1]=-velocity[1];
00334                                 if(delta[2]<0) velocity[2]=-velocity[2];
00335                                 if      (
00336 #ifdef DBVT_BP_MARGIN                           
00337                                         m_sets[0].update(proxy->leaf,aabb,velocity,DBVT_BP_MARGIN)
00338 #else
00339                                         m_sets[0].update(proxy->leaf,aabb,velocity)
00340 #endif
00341                                         )
00342                                 {
00343                                         ++m_updates_done;
00344                                         docollide=true;
00345                                 }
00346                         }
00347                         else
00348                         {/* Teleporting                 */ 
00349                                 m_sets[0].update(proxy->leaf,aabb);
00350                                 ++m_updates_done;
00351                                 docollide=true;
00352                         }       
00353                 }
00354                 listremove(proxy,m_stageRoots[proxy->stage]);
00355                 proxy->m_aabbMin = aabbMin;
00356                 proxy->m_aabbMax = aabbMax;
00357                 proxy->stage    =       m_stageCurrent;
00358                 listappend(proxy,m_stageRoots[m_stageCurrent]);
00359                 if(docollide)
00360                 {
00361                         m_needcleanup=true;
00362                         if(!m_deferedcollide)
00363                         {
00364                                 btDbvtTreeCollider      collider(this);
00365                                 m_sets[1].collideTTpersistentStack(m_sets[1].m_root,proxy->leaf,collider);
00366                                 m_sets[0].collideTTpersistentStack(m_sets[0].m_root,proxy->leaf,collider);
00367                         }
00368                 }       
00369         }
00370 }
00371

00373 //
00374 void                                                    btDbvtBroadphase::setAabbForceUpdate(           btBroadphaseProxy* absproxy,
00375                                                                                                                   const btVector3& aabbMin,
00376                                                                                                                   const btVector3& aabbMax,
00377                                                                                                                   btDispatcher* /*dispatcher*/)
00378 {
00379         btDbvtProxy*                                            proxy=(btDbvtProxy*)absproxy;
00380         ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvtVolume)       aabb=btDbvtVolume::FromMM(aabbMin,aabbMax);
00381         bool    docollide=false;
00382         if(proxy->stage==STAGECOUNT)
00383         {/* fixed -> dynamic set        */ 
00384                 m_sets[1].remove(proxy->leaf);
00385                 proxy->leaf=m_sets[0].insert(aabb,proxy);
00386                 docollide=true;
00387         }
00388         else
00389         {/* dynamic set                         */ 
00390                 ++m_updates_call;
00391                 /* Teleporting                  */ 
00392                 m_sets[0].update(proxy->leaf,aabb);
00393                 ++m_updates_done;
00394                 docollide=true;
00395         }
00396         listremove(proxy,m_stageRoots[proxy->stage]);
00397         proxy->m_aabbMin = aabbMin;
00398         proxy->m_aabbMax = aabbMax;
00399         proxy->stage    =       m_stageCurrent;
00400         listappend(proxy,m_stageRoots[m_stageCurrent]);
00401         if(docollide)
00402         {
00403                 m_needcleanup=true;
00404                 if(!m_deferedcollide)
00405                 {
00406                         btDbvtTreeCollider      collider(this);
00407                         m_sets[1].collideTTpersistentStack(m_sets[1].m_root,proxy->leaf,collider);
00408                         m_sets[0].collideTTpersistentStack(m_sets[0].m_root,proxy->leaf,collider);
00409                 }
00410         }       
00411 }

00413 //
00414 void                                                    btDbvtBroadphase::calculateOverlappingPairs(btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00415 {
00416         collide(dispatcher);
00417 #if DBVT_BP_PROFILE
00418         if(0==(m_pid%DBVT_BP_PROFILING_RATE))
00419         {       
00420                 printf("fixed(%u) dynamics(%u) pairs(%u)\r\n",m_sets[1].m_leaves,m_sets[0].m_leaves,m_paircache->getNumOverlappingPairs());
00421                 unsigned int    total=m_profiling.m_total;
00422                 if(total<=0) total=1;
00423                 printf("ddcollide: %u%% (%uus)\r\n",(50+m_profiling.m_ddcollide*100)/total,m_profiling.m_ddcollide/DBVT_BP_PROFILING_RATE);
00424                 printf("fdcollide: %u%% (%uus)\r\n",(50+m_profiling.m_fdcollide*100)/total,m_profiling.m_fdcollide/DBVT_BP_PROFILING_RATE);
00425                 printf("cleanup:   %u%% (%uus)\r\n",(50+m_profiling.m_cleanup*100)/total,m_profiling.m_cleanup/DBVT_BP_PROFILING_RATE);
00426                 printf("total:     %uus\r\n",total/DBVT_BP_PROFILING_RATE);
00427                 const unsigned long     sum=m_profiling.m_ddcollide+
00428                         m_profiling.m_fdcollide+
00429                         m_profiling.m_cleanup;
00430                 printf("leaked: %u%% (%uus)\r\n",100-((50+sum*100)/total),(total-sum)/DBVT_BP_PROFILING_RATE);
00431                 printf("job counts: %u%%\r\n",(m_profiling.m_jobcount*100)/((m_sets[0].m_leaves+m_sets[1].m_leaves)*DBVT_BP_PROFILING_RATE));
00432                 clear(m_profiling);
00433                 m_clock.reset();
00434         }
00435 #endif
00436 
00437         performDeferredRemoval(dispatcher);
00438 
00439 }
00440 
00441 void btDbvtBroadphase::performDeferredRemoval(btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00442 {
00443 
00444         if (m_paircache->hasDeferredRemoval())
00445         {
00446 
00447                 btBroadphasePairArray&  overlappingPairArray = m_paircache->getOverlappingPairArray();
00448 
00449                 //perform a sort, to find duplicates and to sort 'invalid' pairs to the end
00450                 overlappingPairArray.quickSort(btBroadphasePairSortPredicate());
00451 
00452                 int invalidPair = 0;
00453 
00454                 
00455                 int i;
00456 
00457                 btBroadphasePair previousPair;
00458                 previousPair.m_pProxy0 = 0;
00459                 previousPair.m_pProxy1 = 0;
00460                 previousPair.m_algorithm = 0;
00461                 
00462                 
00463                 for (i=0;i<overlappingPairArray.size();i++)
00464                 {
00465                 
00466                         btBroadphasePair& pair = overlappingPairArray[i];
00467 
00468                         bool isDuplicate = (pair == previousPair);
00469 
00470                         previousPair = pair;
00471 
00472                         bool needsRemoval = false;
00473 
00474                         if (!isDuplicate)
00475                         {
00476                                 //important to perform AABB check that is consistent with the broadphase
00477                                 btDbvtProxy*            pa=(btDbvtProxy*)pair.m_pProxy0;
00478                                 btDbvtProxy*            pb=(btDbvtProxy*)pair.m_pProxy1;
00479                                 bool hasOverlap = Intersect(pa->leaf->volume,pb->leaf->volume);
00480 
00481                                 if (hasOverlap)
00482                                 {
00483                                         needsRemoval = false;
00484                                 } else
00485                                 {
00486                                         needsRemoval = true;
00487                                 }
00488                         } else
00489                         {
00490                                 //remove duplicate
00491                                 needsRemoval = true;
00492                                 //should have no algorithm
00493                                 btAssert(!pair.m_algorithm);
00494                         }
00495                         
00496                         if (needsRemoval)
00497                         {
00498                                 m_paircache->cleanOverlappingPair(pair,dispatcher);
00499 
00500                                 pair.m_pProxy0 = 0;
00501                                 pair.m_pProxy1 = 0;
00502                                 invalidPair++;
00503                         } 
00504                         
00505                 }
00506 
00507                 //perform a sort, to sort 'invalid' pairs to the end
00508                 overlappingPairArray.quickSort(btBroadphasePairSortPredicate());
00509                 overlappingPairArray.resize(overlappingPairArray.size() - invalidPair);
00510         }
00511 }
00512 
00513 //
00514 void                                                    btDbvtBroadphase::collide(btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00515 {
00516         /*printf("---------------------------------------------------------\n");
00517         printf("m_sets[0].m_leaves=%d\n",m_sets[0].m_leaves);
00518         printf("m_sets[1].m_leaves=%d\n",m_sets[1].m_leaves);
00519         printf("numPairs = %d\n",getOverlappingPairCache()->getNumOverlappingPairs());
00520         {
00521                 int i;
00522                 for (i=0;i<getOverlappingPairCache()->getNumOverlappingPairs();i++)
00523                 {
00524                         printf("pair[%d]=(%d,%d),",i,getOverlappingPairCache()->getOverlappingPairArray()[i].m_pProxy0->getUid(),
00525                                 getOverlappingPairCache()->getOverlappingPairArray()[i].m_pProxy1->getUid());
00526                 }
00527                 printf("\n");
00528         }
00529 */
00530 
00531 
00532 
00533         SPC(m_profiling.m_total);
00534         /* optimize                             */ 
00535         m_sets[0].optimizeIncremental(1+(m_sets[0].m_leaves*m_dupdates)/100);
00536         if(m_fixedleft)
00537         {
00538                 const int count=1+(m_sets[1].m_leaves*m_fupdates)/100;
00539                 m_sets[1].optimizeIncremental(1+(m_sets[1].m_leaves*m_fupdates)/100);
00540                 m_fixedleft=btMax<int>(0,m_fixedleft-count);
00541         }
00542         /* dynamic -> fixed set */ 
00543         m_stageCurrent=(m_stageCurrent+1)%STAGECOUNT;
00544         btDbvtProxy*    current=m_stageRoots[m_stageCurrent];
00545         if(current)
00546         {
00547 #if DBVT_BP_ACCURATESLEEPING
00548                 btDbvtTreeCollider      collider(this);
00549 #endif
00550                 do      {
00551                         btDbvtProxy*    next=current->links[1];
00552                         listremove(current,m_stageRoots[current->stage]);
00553                         listappend(current,m_stageRoots[STAGECOUNT]);
00554 #if DBVT_BP_ACCURATESLEEPING
00555                         m_paircache->removeOverlappingPairsContainingProxy(current,dispatcher);
00556                         collider.proxy=current;
00557                         btDbvt::collideTV(m_sets[0].m_root,current->aabb,collider);
00558                         btDbvt::collideTV(m_sets[1].m_root,current->aabb,collider);
00559 #endif
00560                         m_sets[0].remove(current->leaf);
00561                         ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvtVolume)       curAabb=btDbvtVolume::FromMM(current->m_aabbMin,current->m_aabbMax);
00562                         current->leaf   =       m_sets[1].insert(curAabb,current);
00563                         current->stage  =       STAGECOUNT;     
00564                         current                 =       next;
00565                 } while(current);
00566                 m_fixedleft=m_sets[1].m_leaves;
00567                 m_needcleanup=true;
00568         }
00569         /* collide dynamics             */ 
00570         {
00571                 btDbvtTreeCollider      collider(this);
00572                 if(m_deferedcollide)
00573                 {
00574                         SPC(m_profiling.m_fdcollide);
00575                         m_sets[0].collideTTpersistentStack(m_sets[0].m_root,m_sets[1].m_root,collider);
00576                 }
00577                 if(m_deferedcollide)
00578                 {
00579                         SPC(m_profiling.m_ddcollide);
00580                         m_sets[0].collideTTpersistentStack(m_sets[0].m_root,m_sets[0].m_root,collider);
00581                 }
00582         }
00583         /* clean up                             */ 
00584         if(m_needcleanup)
00585         {
00586                 SPC(m_profiling.m_cleanup);
00587                 btBroadphasePairArray&  pairs=m_paircache->getOverlappingPairArray();
00588                 if(pairs.size()>0)
00589                 {
00590 
00591                         int                     ni=btMin(pairs.size(),btMax<int>(m_newpairs,(pairs.size()*m_cupdates)/100));
00592                         for(int i=0;i<ni;++i)
00593                         {
00594                                 btBroadphasePair&       p=pairs[(m_cid+i)%pairs.size()];
00595                                 btDbvtProxy*            pa=(btDbvtProxy*)p.m_pProxy0;
00596                                 btDbvtProxy*            pb=(btDbvtProxy*)p.m_pProxy1;
00597                                 if(!Intersect(pa->leaf->volume,pb->leaf->volume))
00598                                 {
00599 #if DBVT_BP_SORTPAIRS
00600                                         if(pa->m_uniqueId>pb->m_uniqueId) 
00601                                                 btSwap(pa,pb);
00602 #endif
00603                                         m_paircache->removeOverlappingPair(pa,pb,dispatcher);
00604                                         --ni;--i;
00605                                 }
00606                         }
00607                         if(pairs.size()>0) m_cid=(m_cid+ni)%pairs.size(); else m_cid=0;
00608                 }
00609         }
00610         ++m_pid;
00611         m_newpairs=1;
00612         m_needcleanup=false;
00613         if(m_updates_call>0)
00614         { m_updates_ratio=m_updates_done/(btScalar)m_updates_call; }
00615         else
00616         { m_updates_ratio=0; }
00617         m_updates_done/=2;
00618         m_updates_call/=2;
00619 }
00620 
00621 //
00622 void                                                    btDbvtBroadphase::optimize()
00623 {
00624         m_sets[0].optimizeTopDown();
00625         m_sets[1].optimizeTopDown();
00626 }
00627 
00628 //
00629 btOverlappingPairCache*                 btDbvtBroadphase::getOverlappingPairCache()
00630 {
00631         return(m_paircache);
00632 }
00633 
00634 //
00635 const btOverlappingPairCache*   btDbvtBroadphase::getOverlappingPairCache() const
00636 {
00637         return(m_paircache);
00638 }
00639 
00640 //
00641 void                                                    btDbvtBroadphase::getBroadphaseAabb(btVector3& aabbMin,btVector3& aabbMax) const
00642 {
00643 
00644         ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvtVolume)       bounds;
00645 
00646         if(!m_sets[0].empty())
00647                 if(!m_sets[1].empty())  Merge(  m_sets[0].m_root->volume,
00648                         m_sets[1].m_root->volume,bounds);
00649                 else
00650                         bounds=m_sets[0].m_root->volume;
00651         else if(!m_sets[1].empty())     bounds=m_sets[1].m_root->volume;
00652         else
00653                 bounds=btDbvtVolume::FromCR(btVector3(0,0,0),0);
00654         aabbMin=bounds.Mins();
00655         aabbMax=bounds.Maxs();
00656 }
00657 
00658 void btDbvtBroadphase::resetPool(btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00659 {
00660         
00661         int totalObjects = m_sets[0].m_leaves + m_sets[1].m_leaves;
00662         if (!totalObjects)
00663         {
00664                 //reset internal dynamic tree data structures
00665                 m_sets[0].clear();
00666                 m_sets[1].clear();
00667                 
00668                 m_deferedcollide        =       false;
00669                 m_needcleanup           =       true;
00670                 m_stageCurrent          =       0;
00671                 m_fixedleft                     =       0;
00672                 m_fupdates                      =       1;
00673                 m_dupdates                      =       0;
00674                 m_cupdates                      =       10;
00675                 m_newpairs                      =       1;
00676                 m_updates_call          =       0;
00677                 m_updates_done          =       0;
00678                 m_updates_ratio         =       0;
00679                 
00680                 m_gid                           =       0;
00681                 m_pid                           =       0;
00682                 m_cid                           =       0;
00683                 for(int i=0;i<=STAGECOUNT;++i)
00684                 {
00685                         m_stageRoots[i]=0;
00686                 }
00687         }
00688 }
00689 
00690 //
00691 void                                                    btDbvtBroadphase::printStats()
00692 {}
00693 
00694 //
00695 #if DBVT_BP_ENABLE_BENCHMARK
00696 
00697 struct  btBroadphaseBenchmark
00698 {
00699         struct  Experiment
00700         {
00701                 const char*                     name;
00702                 int                                     object_count;
00703                 int                                     update_count;
00704                 int                                     spawn_count;
00705                 int                                     iterations;
00706                 btScalar                        speed;
00707                 btScalar                        amplitude;
00708         };
00709         struct  Object
00710         {
00711                 btVector3                       center;
00712                 btVector3                       extents;
00713                 btBroadphaseProxy*      proxy;
00714                 btScalar                        time;
00715                 void                            update(btScalar speed,btScalar amplitude,btBroadphaseInterface* pbi)
00716                 {
00717                         time            +=      speed;
00718                         center[0]       =       btCos(time*(btScalar)2.17)*amplitude+
00719                                 btSin(time)*amplitude/2;
00720                         center[1]       =       btCos(time*(btScalar)1.38)*amplitude+
00721                                 btSin(time)*amplitude;
00722                         center[2]       =       btSin(time*(btScalar)0.777)*amplitude;
00723                         pbi->setAabb(proxy,center-extents,center+extents,0);
00724                 }
00725         };
00726         static int              UnsignedRand(int range=RAND_MAX-1)      { return(rand()%(range+1)); }
00727         static btScalar UnitRand()                                                      { return(UnsignedRand(16384)/(btScalar)16384); }
00728         static void             OutputTime(const char* name,btClock& c,unsigned count=0)
00729         {
00730                 const unsigned long     us=c.getTimeMicroseconds();
00731                 const unsigned long     ms=(us+500)/1000;
00732                 const btScalar          sec=us/(btScalar)(1000*1000);
00733                 if(count>0)
00734                         printf("%s : %u us (%u ms), %.2f/s\r\n",name,us,ms,count/sec);
00735                 else
00736                         printf("%s : %u us (%u ms)\r\n",name,us,ms);
00737         }
00738 };
00739 
00740 void                                                    btDbvtBroadphase::benchmark(btBroadphaseInterface* pbi)
00741 {
00742         static const btBroadphaseBenchmark::Experiment          experiments[]=
00743         {
00744                 {"1024o.10%",1024,10,0,8192,(btScalar)0.005,(btScalar)100},
00745                 /*{"4096o.10%",4096,10,0,8192,(btScalar)0.005,(btScalar)100},
00746                 {"8192o.10%",8192,10,0,8192,(btScalar)0.005,(btScalar)100},*/
00747         };
00748         static const int                                                                                nexperiments=sizeof(experiments)/sizeof(experiments[0]);
00749         btAlignedObjectArray<btBroadphaseBenchmark::Object*>    objects;
00750         btClock                                                                                                 wallclock;
00751         /* Begin                        */ 
00752         for(int iexp=0;iexp<nexperiments;++iexp)
00753         {
00754                 const btBroadphaseBenchmark::Experiment&        experiment=experiments[iexp];
00755                 const int                                                                       object_count=experiment.object_count;
00756                 const int                                                                       update_count=(object_count*experiment.update_count)/100;
00757                 const int                                                                       spawn_count=(object_count*experiment.spawn_count)/100;
00758                 const btScalar                                                          speed=experiment.speed; 
00759                 const btScalar                                                          amplitude=experiment.amplitude;
00760                 printf("Experiment #%u '%s':\r\n",iexp,experiment.name);
00761                 printf("\tObjects: %u\r\n",object_count);
00762                 printf("\tUpdate: %u\r\n",update_count);
00763                 printf("\tSpawn: %u\r\n",spawn_count);
00764                 printf("\tSpeed: %f\r\n",speed);
00765                 printf("\tAmplitude: %f\r\n",amplitude);
00766                 srand(180673);
00767                 /* Create objects       */ 
00768                 wallclock.reset();
00769                 objects.reserve(object_count);
00770                 for(int i=0;i<object_count;++i)
00771                 {
00772                         btBroadphaseBenchmark::Object*  po=new btBroadphaseBenchmark::Object();
00773                         po->center[0]=btBroadphaseBenchmark::UnitRand()*50;
00774                         po->center[1]=btBroadphaseBenchmark::UnitRand()*50;
00775                         po->center[2]=btBroadphaseBenchmark::UnitRand()*50;
00776                         po->extents[0]=btBroadphaseBenchmark::UnitRand()*2+2;
00777                         po->extents[1]=btBroadphaseBenchmark::UnitRand()*2+2;
00778                         po->extents[2]=btBroadphaseBenchmark::UnitRand()*2+2;
00779                         po->time=btBroadphaseBenchmark::UnitRand()*2000;
00780                         po->proxy=pbi->createProxy(po->center-po->extents,po->center+po->extents,0,po,1,1,0,0);
00781                         objects.push_back(po);
00782                 }
00783                 btBroadphaseBenchmark::OutputTime("\tInitialization",wallclock);
00784                 /* First update         */ 
00785                 wallclock.reset();
00786                 for(int i=0;i<objects.size();++i)
00787                 {
00788                         objects[i]->update(speed,amplitude,pbi);
00789                 }
00790                 btBroadphaseBenchmark::OutputTime("\tFirst update",wallclock);
00791                 /* Updates                      */ 
00792                 wallclock.reset();
00793                 for(int i=0;i<experiment.iterations;++i)
00794                 {
00795                         for(int j=0;j<update_count;++j)
00796                         {                               
00797                                 objects[j]->update(speed,amplitude,pbi);
00798                         }
00799                         pbi->calculateOverlappingPairs(0);
00800                 }
00801                 btBroadphaseBenchmark::OutputTime("\tUpdate",wallclock,experiment.iterations);
00802                 /* Clean up                     */ 
00803                 wallclock.reset();
00804                 for(int i=0;i<objects.size();++i)
00805                 {
00806                         pbi->destroyProxy(objects[i]->proxy,0);
00807                         delete objects[i];
00808                 }
00809                 objects.resize(0);
00810                 btBroadphaseBenchmark::OutputTime("\tRelease",wallclock);
00811         }
00812 
00813 }
00814 #else
00815 void                                                    btDbvtBroadphase::benchmark(btBroadphaseInterface*)
00816 {}
00817 #endif
00818

00820 #undef  SPC
